text: w'in yukadhibuk qwmk- 'ayuha alrswl- faqad sbqhm fi takdhib rusuluhum qawm nwh, wead, wthmwd, waqawm 'ibrahym, waqawm lwt, wa'ashab "mdyn" aladhin kadhabuu sheybana, wkdhdhab fireawn waqawmuh mwsa, falam aeajl hadhih al'umam baleqwbt, bal amhltha, thuma akhdht kla minhum baledhab, fakayf kan 'inkary ealayhim kufruhum wtkdhybhm, wtbdyl ma kan bihim min niemat bialeadhab walhlak?
